title: The Heretic Priest
description: "You fool, he has betrayed you. And now he is toying with you."  The war between gods is nowhere near over. As Azrael and Saldon continue to pit their favorites against one another, the stakes are raised; deals are made and alliances are shattered.  While Pharun and Encarz prepare to war against each other, Felix is left to pick up the pieces of his life. Lonely and betrayed, he finds himself giving up everything he knows to follow a god he never cared for. In these trying times, who should step up to offer friendship but the angel of an unlikely god?  Even though he is trying to start over, Felix knows one thing ... Pharun will never stop using him.
author: C.N. Faust
